lender.name: Jennifer
lender.occupational_info: I basically help to keep track of money that comes in and money that goes out of the company I work for.

lender.name: Myrna
lender.loan_because: I have always believed in the principal of 'helping people to help themselves'. Kiva is a great way to do this. I have been with Kiva three years now. I love when I have repaid money and get to pick a new person to help out!

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful way to help others and to share my blessings.
lender.occupational_info: I create websites.

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves the opportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I study community planning at the University of Maryland. I dream of improving the lives of many people through planning for the future of the places where they live, work, and play.

lender.name: dvinedesigns.etsy.com
lender.loan_because: I can! I love the concept and love what it does to the people and their families!
lender.occupational_info: I work for AT&T during the day as a graphic designer. At night and on the weekends I'm making Jewelry and selling at craft fairs, dvinedesigns.etsy.com and on Ebay. Making Miracles every day!!

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: helping individuals succeed, helps the world
lender.occupational_info: I help teach people who live in cities about nature.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: I have the ability to help and the motivation to do so. I know that the world can only really change one person at a time and I am committed to doing my part.
lender.occupational_info: The legal situation in any given case I deal with only offers a container for the real work that I do: to help clients realize how their choices effect their experiences and how making better choices in alignment with integrity can and does bring real and lasting success. Since Kiva is founded on the same principles of working in integrity, I am overjoyed to be a part of it and to have been able to offer gift certificates to my clients and colleagues as Christmas presents so that they can also experience the real joy of sharing.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I like to feel that my money is helping people at the grass roots make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I tutor college students, am semi-retired from college teaching, write a lot of poetry and various articles.

lender.name: Kathi and Rick
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others. We are so fortunate in the US. We need to support hard working people in other countries.
lender.occupational_info: Wholesale business

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: a little encouragement can go a long way!
lender.occupational_info: I spin, knit, weave and sew all I can

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I love seeing that people can take action to improve their lives and have the opportunity to grow.
lender.occupational_info: I help people align their natural passion with their career.

lender.name: Aliyah
lender.loan_because: to give back.
lender.occupational_info: i have just started my path to organic sustainable farming. i believe that the food we eat is essential to our health both physically, mentally, and spiritually. using methods of agriculture that work with nature, will best help heal mother earth and heal the human spirit.

lender.name: SSLA - BIG
lender.loan_because: Nothing is impossible

lender.name: anna
lender.loan_because: It's a sustainable form of accompaniment.

lender.name: GEORGE
lender.loan_because: Micro lending not only helps the borrower but also those around them. Kiva is doing a wonderful service with this web site.
lender.occupational_info: I invest in small office buildings and shopping centers.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I believe every person should have an equal opportunity to improve their lifestyle through their own initiative.
lender.occupational_info: I successfully built a multi-million dollar business which my son now operates. I manage a group of fishing and hunting lodges in Saskatchewan, Canada, as my retirement activity.

lender.name: Harvey
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I ride around coming up with idea's that I'm gonna do someday.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I can't afford grand gestures so this allows me to help people without the opportunities that I have, in small ways.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an advertising display company, doing administrative work and scheduling for our production area.

lender.name: Deb & Urban
lender.loan_because: We want to share some of our good fortune...

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I love people and feel it's important to help those who are willing to work to create the life they desire but may need a little help from their friends!
lender.occupational_info: I help people discover what is programed in their subconscious and then shift it at the level of their subconscious to what they would like to believe.

lender.name: Evans Family
lender.loan_because: We believe that if you can help someone, you should help someone. And we want this world to be a little better because we were here.
lender.occupational_info: El Salvador Sudan Haiti Chad

lender.name: Janne
lender.loan_because: I want to help people where they live.

lender.name: Anne-Lise
lender.loan_because: I think this is the best way I directly can provide for someone to get hold of their start-up capital for their business.
lender.occupational_info: I help business owners and entrepreneurs develop a businessplan, a strategy or simulare economic related planning for themselves and their business.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: To help someone who are not so lucky as i have been in my life
lender.occupational_info: Retiered masterbaker and production planing engineer

lender.name: Torunn
lender.loan_because: I really do belive in helping other people to help themselves.

lender.name: Todd: ValuePlays
lender.loan_because: To help people start an independent life.
lender.occupational_info: Currently blog about business and investing.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I believe we are a world community and I want to help people succeed when they are working to better their condition.
lender.occupational_info: I interview customers to find out what they want computer programs to do. Computer programers use these instructions to code programs.

lender.name: Anton
lender.loan_because: I love to make people happy
lender.occupational_info: I invent new things to make people happy

lender.name: nicole
lender.loan_because: BECAUSE I CAN

lender.name: Natasha
lender.occupation: owner of a scin care clinic

lender.name: Birgitte
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Mariann
lender.loan_because: Maybe I can help someone make a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Ric
lender.loan_because: i can.
lender.occupational_info: I manage risks for a small Jesuit university.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: While we all struggle in our own ways, I know that I am blessed with a lovely home and a great husband. I want to share what I have with other women and this is one way to do that on a global level. I chose to support mostly clothing businesses because my husband is in that business - a commonality.
lender.occupational_info: I provide public relations, marketing and advertising services to small and medium sized businesses. These companies are looking to promote their businesses to other companies that need their services.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: I can:)

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune by helping independent people who want to improve their lives and their families lives by making their own way in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Water Colour Artist

lender.name: Patti
lender.loan_because: It feels good to be able to help others around the world, and make a positive difference in their lives.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: It's a great way of helping people help themselves. I love how our small loans can change the life of someone on the other side of the globe

lender.name: Gudveig
lender.loan_because: I can! A "drop in the ocean" for me may make a world of difference to someone else - so since I CAN, why should I not?
lender.occupational_info: I design old fashioned, sampler style cross stitch patterns

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I want to help those people who are willing to work hard and use their creativity and knowledge to build better lives for themselves and set a good example for their communities
lender.occupational_info: I help people find loans to purchase and refinance their homes and business properties. I also in the professional theatre as a director of plays and musicals

lender.name: Bernardo & Alina
lender.occupation: B: VP, GM eCommerce - A: TV Producer

lender.name: Neal
lender.loan_because: With most charitable giving you have no idea where your money is going. Kiva allows me to track where my money is spent. It also lets me know that my money is going to someone that is willing to work for help not just ask for handouts.

lender.name: Royce
lender.loan_because: My family wants to help
lender.occupational_info: Office job that is busy keeping records of property and supplies.

lender.name: Grey
lender.loan_because: It is important to help out people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I design financial magazines

lender.name: Frøydis
lender.loan_because: I needed help my self once....
lender.occupational_info: I always do my work with love, and then I get lots of love back!! It doesnt matter what you do, but how......

lender.name: Eva and Kjartan
lender.loan_because: We hope to make a difference in somebodies life.

lender.name: The Barrera Family
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I make movies.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women in the world.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and would like to be a blessing to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: Making processes run better - continuous improvement

lender.name: James
lender.occupational_info: I research, plan, and write educational materials including books, video, and interactive software for public schools.

lender.name: Rachel and Bill
lender.loan_because: "We are the people we've been waiting for."

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I want to help others become self-sustaining instead of charity cases. Kiva is an excellent way to know that I am helping someone to be able to continue supporting themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I help large companies by writing computer programs for them to operate their business with.

lender.name: Marissa
lender.loan_because: This is an amazing way to thwart bureaucracy and give money directly (or almost directly) to people who truly need it.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a book publishing company which publishes books to help teachers improve their teaching skills.

lender.name: Marco
lender.loan_because: I find it nice to help out people, and this seems like to perfect way to do that.
lender.occupational_info: I make invoices of tents we sell and I look after the computer system as well.

lender.name: Estella
lender.loan_because: we are all in this world together. We each must do what we can to support one another.

lender.name: Carole
lender.loan_because: it keeps me in touch with the rest of the world. We are all in this together and helping one another along is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: The most important work I have done is raising two sons.

lender.name: One Horizon Foundation
lender.loan_because: We are very excited about the work that Kiva is doing and believe that these kinds of grassroots efforts are an essential part of people joining together to build a world that works for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: We are an international foundation working for the common good by supporting local initiatives aimed at creating a more just, peaceable, and satisfying future for all people.

lender.name: Kjersti
lender.loan_because: I liked the consept of helping people to help themself

lender.name: Parikh Family
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in someon'e life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in IT for Health Care industry.

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: I received help from others when I needed to start my own business to feed my children and keep a roof over our heads, and I want to do the same now for somebody else.
lender.occupational_info: I translate written documents from Norwegian to English in the area of research and higher education.

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference.

lender.name: MarcomTeam
lender.loan_because: as an all-female workgroup, we want to help women around the world improve their quality of life.

lender.name: Jeffery
lender.loan_because: I can assist in making the impossible possible for those who dream of a better life.

lender.name: Mindy
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to make a living at something they enjoy.

lender.name: Kylene
lender.loan_because: It's important to help small businesses thrive.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life and its my duty as a human being to reach out to others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I help people protect themselves and their family against financial hardships.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I believe in people's ability to help themselves. No one knows better how to improve an individual's quality of life than the individual themselves.

lender.name: Anny-Beth
lender.loan_because: I want to help, and I like the idea of knowing where the money goes.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I like the businesses of banking and technology.
lender.occupational_info: I invest in developing markets.

lender.name: Dianne
lender.loan_because: I bieve it's important to help others if you can. Could I use the $25? Sure, but I think some people can put it to better use. It's very important to share the wealth!

lender.name: Kirsty
lender.loan_because: I like the concept of supporting small businesses as another way of giving to people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a fertility clinic

lender.name: Nandi
lender.loan_because: It's a nice way to help someone that needs a helping hand along the way.

lender.name: Hernan
lender.loan_because: I believe this is a great way to help others. Join and you'll see...

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: I believe in micro-economics and supporting people's ambitions.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a television studio pampering producers by fulfilling their whims.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I lived in Asia for 5 years and enjoyed seeing the power of people inspired to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I run a small youth baseball academy in Houston, Texas, USA

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others, and to share our good fortune. It connects us to people around the globe.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: Small amount of money can make a big difference in other peoples life, and contributing to their well being.

lender.name: John & Evelyn
lender.loan_because: It is our privilege to share what we have with others. For what we have we also have received. 1 Cor 4:7
lender.occupational_info: John sells industrial chemicals. Evelyn is a homemaker and does volunteer work for Medical Teams International

lender.name: Kendal
lender.loan_because: I loan because I enjoy seeing innovative small business at work.
lender.occupational_info: I write books, some enjoy and I write books that some do not enjoy. (I am lucky to have a few people that enjoy reading them)

lender.name: Melissa
lender.occupational_info: I create camps for high school students from Mexico and the US to be able to build genuine friendships, talk honestly about our differences and prejudices, and serve local churches in their communities.

lender.name: Gemma Yaela
lender.loan_because: I want everyone to be able to raise their family well.
lender.occupational_info: business owner

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: A small effort from one can make a big difference to all.
lender.occupational_info: I help social, ethical, and environmental businesses to succeed

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I am loaning $180.00 on behalf of all of my favorite customer's who support me in my business, here in Canada, as a Sales Rep. I am very fortunate to live in a country where you are rewarded for hard work. I am also very passionate about empowering women so that they are unafraid and feel strong within themselves.
lender.occupational_info: My work is interesting and rewarding. I am able to travel around the province that I live in and no two days are ever the same. I meet with people all day and try to meet their needs by supplying their practices and business with quality accessories. I work with many people who are entrepreneurs as well. They own their own businesses aiding people with health care and products for the eyes. It is wonderful work but a great deal of driving!

lender.name: Arielle
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help others help themselves and I am fortunate enough to be able to have some money I can lend.
lender.occupational_info: I help make our county more safe for the children who live in it by reviewing child deaths and making prevention strategies.

lender.name: Branislav & Mirjana
lender.loan_because: We all need a little help sometime. Talent, hard work and enthusiasm are not always enough.
lender.occupational_info: We help our clients improve the quality of their workplace.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world and I care about people.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: there are many people in the world who want to get out of the cycle of poverty but aren't given the opportunity to do so. Kiva provides a fantastic opportunity for people to create or expand their business and provide for their families.

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: This is an interesting way to directly help others in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with software and technology in the investment industry

lender.name: Nichole
lender.loan_because: It feels good to know that I am helping a real person with a real face and name and a family, instead of just donating to some random organization and never knowing who or how it helped.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure networks are running correctly so people worldwide can use the internet and make phone calls

lender.name: Teena
lender.loan_because: sometimes people just need a little help to do some really amazing things in the world.

lender.name: JUNE
lender.loan_because: I want to share the blessings I have received from GOD with others.

lender.name: Carol Lee
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers

lender.name: Riley
lender.loan_because: I loan because I would hope that if I were in an unfortunate position, somebody would help me with my business. I think everybody should pitch in to help the world be a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 6th grade student. I enjoy golf, soccer, basketball, shopping and hanging out with my friends.

lender.name: Marcia
lender.loan_because: I want to share my blessings with people who need a little help.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of people who have cancer.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate enough to be a successful businesswoman with so many resources and help in my own country. I would like to help other working mothers in the world provide for their own families and better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am sales consultant for a Human Resources Management firm in Atlanta. We have locations all across the world so I am familiar with and enjoy working internationally.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: Everyone's Dream Matters! Feeding the spirit of entrepreneurs generates optimism and self sufficiency on a grass roots level.
lender.occupational_info: Graphic Designer for a metropolitan newspaper.

lender.name: Diann
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and have always wanted to be in a position to give back. Giving is what God wants us all to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am the author and owner of the United States Marine Corps Bulldog Logo copyright. I license companies to incorporate my copyright logos onto products worldwide. I receive royalties for the licenses.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur myself, I can appreciate the importance of loans to expand your business.
lender.occupational_info: I help Canadian homeowners find mortgages for their homes from a variety of different lenders.

lender.name: The McQuillan Family
lender.loan_because: we've been given much to share

lender.name: lori
lender.loan_because: What goes around comes around

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: everyone should have a bunny.
lender.occupational_info: I look at patent cases and computers.

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: "From those to whom much is given, much is expected." -- Luke 12:48

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: "Give a man a fish, you feed him for today...Teach a man to fish; and you have fed him for a lifetime"... Kiva is a great program helping people help themselves!

lender.name: Marianne
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Arthur
lender.loan_because: I didn't have this available, and a micro-loan seems reasonable. As an American, I am greatly appreciative of what others have done to make capitalism popular, and I hope to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work on indoor plumbing, and assist with building houses.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to show my daughter that a little bit can go a long way to helping people
lender.occupational_info: I help manage an office.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: we are all in this together

lender.loan_because: I wanted to help others achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Shelly
lender.loan_because: I

lender.occupational_info: I work for a hotel and timeshare resort on Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, USA

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I have a strong desire to help people to pursue their passion and/or business just as I hope someone would do for me.
lender.occupational_info: I plan events and weddings at a contemporary art museum in Boston.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: Here it is relatively easy to get a loan - I am glad to contribute to this "global bank" and help those who have fewer options than me.

lender.name: Pankaj
lender.loan_because: I can get it back and then I can loan it to someone else.......

lender.name: Maryam
lender.loan_because: I believe if we all help each other we can eliminate poverty and make a better world for everyone.

lender.name: Kimberley
lender.loan_because: I like to help people out!
lender.occupational_info: One of a kind sterling silver wire and sterling impression jewelry .

lender.name: Our dog Nate
lender.loan_because: I love that so little can help in such a big way.
lender.occupational_info: I am the stay home mother of three children.

lender.name: Mendoza Family
lender.loan_because: we practice caritas.

lender.name: Claudia
lender.loan_because: I want to help those in need! I am so blessed to have all that I do!
lender.occupational_info: I make loans to companies and manage a commercial loan portfolio.

lender.name: Linnea & Brian
lender.loan_because: It is a gift you can give and give again and again, making a tangible impact each time.

lender.name: Davina
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference to the world.
lender.occupational_info: Moulding the future of a nation.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: We're all human beings, and we're our best hope.
lender.occupational_info: I come up with ideas and write commercials and other things for TV.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: In the right hands a little can go a long long way.

lender.name: Beverly
lender.loan_because: I had help starting my own business and this is my way of "paying it forward".
lender.occupational_info: I am retired because of a disability. I sell on eBay now as a hobby.

lender.name: Steph
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel great to help out.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner myself and I know first hand, it takes resources to get a dream off the ground. I believe in micro-credit and in the entrepreneurs around the world that are improving their communities, providing jobs and bettering their local economy.
lender.occupational_info: I design and create beautiful gardens and outdoor living spaces for home owners.

lender.name: sue
lender.loan_because: Doing so makes a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a paralegal in an U.S. immigration law firm. I assist our lawyers in representing individuals from diverse cultures who want to immigrate to America. Working in an immigration firm has helped me to understand the struggles and obstacles so many folks face in their daily lives. So, being a Kiva.org lender is a natural fit.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: It's a way to "pay it forward" and express my thanks to God for the many blessings He has given our family. Also, it's EXCITING to help someone help themselves! Each one of us can make a positive impact on the world!

lender.name: Taylor
lender.loan_because: I'm poor as well.
lender.occupational_info: Working towards being a photojournalist.

lender.name: Robert Brody
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in many ways and this is a great way to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to exercise and eat properly to live a healthier life.

lender.name: Erika
lender.loan_because: I admire the entrepreneurs' ambition and initiative to operate their own business.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the government department of transportation procurement section.

lender.name: Wylie
lender.loan_because: a little money can go a long way
lender.occupational_info: Researcher focused on finding effective ways to improve couple and family relations

lender.name: Laura
lender.occupation: Stay at Home Mom of Twins

lender.name: Nicolas
lender.loan_because:
Happy Birthday Nico! I hope you like Giovanna as much as I do and are excited that the donation I made in your name will help her business.
Lots of love, Auntie Korky

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I like helping individuals and entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired General Building Contractor who specialized in Structural Commercial and Residential Remodeling and Construction.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.occupation: French as a Second Language teacher

lender.name: mark
lender.loan_because: because I care
lender.occupational_info: I'am In the food business, working fairs and festivals

lender.name: Jon Falker
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is a simple and effective tool to fight poverty.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: It's amazing to be able to make a tangible difference.

lender.name: Mia
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the United States Army. I am very fortunate to have a wonderful job as a middle school teacher with the US Army. I work with adolescents ranging from 12 to 15. I also a volunteer with several organizations so I stay buzy.

lender.name: Winnie & Victor
lender.loan_because: The longest journey begins with the first step
lender.occupational_info: Data analysis and interpretation

lender.name: Steve & Merrilee
lender.loan_because: We want to see other people improve their lives and the lives of their families. We have been richly blessed and want to find ways to share with others. We like the way Kiva recycles resources so that gifts keep on giving and giving.
lender.occupational_info: Steve works with computer software for a company that sets up business software for large manufacturing companies. Merrilee is an attorney, and on the Poway City Council.

lender.name: Kevin, Sarah and Jayne
lender.loan_because: Most people we've met are essentially industrious and generous. We believe this loaning business rewards both of these traits and are glad to be participants.
lender.occupational_info: I build homes. I do all the trades, but mostly carpentry.

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Educate doctors and other healthcare professionals about the pharmaceutical products I sell.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I believe you really can make a difference one person at a time.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I believe in a positive flow of energy on this planet.... I think KIVA is a means to promote this flow.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked for more than 20 years with people seeking political and religious asylum in the United States.... I lived in Iran for many years and understand that we humans are one people.

lender.name: Tracey
lender.loan_because: It's good to give any help I can to people working hard to make a living.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I am so truly fortunate in my own life, that it's the least I can do to help others.

lender.name: John & Nancy
lender.loan_because: We would like to help.

lender.name: Sandra & Aaron
lender.loan_because: I have hope that in some way my small contribution helps someone to acheive something better for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am the director of sales and operations for one of the largest organic farms in Southern California. I sell organic vegetables to large distribution centers and grocery stores. In addition to that our farm operates a 3000 member community supported agriculture program in the San Pasqual Valley.

lender.name: Lorraine
lender.loan_because: I realize how lucky I am to have been born in a rich country with opportunities for education and satisfying work. Everyone should have the chance to realize their potential.
lender.occupational_info: I teach writing to college students and help high school students to score well on college entrance exams.

lender.name: Bob and Bev
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurism knows no political boundaries, and those who practice it aid all society by creating an environment where self sufficiency is admired and encouraged.
lender.occupational_info: Helping individuals attain financial independence.

lender.name: Meg
lender.loan_because: I am only one person & can only make a small impact in the world- but with Kiva that impact seems more "direct" for lack of a better term.
lender.occupational_info: Paralegal/editor for the State Legislature of Nevada, the law-making body of the state. Lots of reviewing & reading.

lender.name: Carlo
lender.loan_because: “Give a man a fish; you have fed him for today. Teach a man to fish; and you have fed him for a lifetime”

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a team to build software for the internet.

lender.name: Marylou
lender.occupational_info: elementary school principal

lender.name: Shelley
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I' a co-owner of a log home building company. We make hand-crafted log homes using local logs and ship them worldwide.

lender.name: Toni
lender.loan_because: I love giving and I am so fortunate in my life. This is really fun
lender.occupational_info: I am a physician and my practice is adults from teens to old age. I also work in health care administration, hoping to improve health for Americans.

lender.name: Sunny
lender.loan_because: Giving feels good.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: It's such a great way to reach out and touch someone.... and to make a big difference in a life with just a small gesture.

lender.name: Gwen Roberts
lender.loan_because: This account is the Gwen Roberts memorial fund setup by her Grandson. Gwen was an extremely generous women who I believe would have loved Kiva and the idea it represented. The aim of the fund is to pick people either living in one of the many countries Gwen travelled to or who through their work have some connection with Gwen. I belive giving others less fortunate the opportunity to help themselves is an especially fitting memorial to such an amazing woman.

lender.name: Seth_Dickens_PornStar
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to give.
lender.occupational_info: I have sex on film. The way I look at it I save marriages =).

lender.name: Bart
lender.loan_because: This is an opportunity to give back and see the results.
lender.occupational_info: I design business software for a leading computer software company.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world and this is a great way to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I grew up extremely poor so I know about trying to get out of poverty. A liitle help can go a long way to fill in the gap and give encouragement.
lender.occupational_info: I am the assistant to the Resource Teacher. My duties include teaching math, reading, and as needed. I love working with these children who have various special needs i.e. ADHD, & Autism.

lender.name: roberta
lender.loan_because: I believe in hope and empowerment through microfinancing.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: John is an intuitive healer and certified massage therapist, who provides private healing sessions, life coaching, and mentoring in the practical application of the Universal Laws of Attraction, new paradigm business, and conscious life creation. John also leads groups, workshops, and retreats covering subjects ranging from cleansing and healing, to prosperity consciousness and sustainable living. John's life's work is to empower people to define, create, and live the life of their dreams.

lender.name: Mitch
lender.loan_because: Why not?

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: My job involves taking care of the medical needs of companion animals. And the pets I care for have access to better medical treatment than many humans around the world. So I loan as expiation for this immense injustice. I am an atheist. When your actions have a positive impact on people around you and/or on your community or the world in general, then you have done the "right thing". I don't need God/god/gods to tell me that.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: microcredit loans are a great way to help others who are in need by allowing them to create a sustainable business capable of bettering their lives for years to come...
lender.occupational_info: Colorado State University... GO RAMS!

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: Helping people is what we should all be doing in these troubled times.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Loans Officer in a Credit Union.

lender.name: Garrett
lender.loan_because: it can help
lender.occupational_info: I tell stories

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: Sometimes in our lives we've all needed a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who have been injured or become ill to regain their indepedance.

lender.name: Susanne
lender.occupation: Web Producer, Public Library of Science
lender.loan_because: I loan to entrepreneurs via Kiva because I am inspired by their dedication to their business, family, and community. I hope that my small contribution will help bring them success.
lender.occupational_info: As a web producer for the Public Library of Science (http://www.plos.org), I help make research results accessible to everyone, in the hopes of advancing scientific and medical discoveries.

lender.name: Jairemarie
lender.loan_because: I want to give in a way that helps people keep their dignity and build self-esteem through small business ownership. Micro lending is a highly successful and legitimate way to help others help themselves. Kiva.org gives me the satisfaction of knowing exactly where my contribution is going to be used. I also appreciate the human connection which makes giving through Kiva a real joy.
lender.occupational_info: I am a food writer and cooking teacher and am committed to helping people understand the benefits of eating local, organically grown food.

lender.name: Harald
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute because I can
lender.occupational_info: I work in a local utility company as controller

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help out people who need help. Especially when they are starting out on their own business.
lender.occupational_info: I answer the phone in a 490 bed hospital. It is the hospital where I was born many years ago. I transfer calls to people who are in our hospital from their families and friends. We also page (call) doctors for the hospital and help doctors when they call in. I work the shift from nighttime till the morning.

lender.name: Matias
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Business student

lender.name: Candyce
lender.loan_because: This is a tremendous way to help others! Since the loan is paid back it gives the oppurtunity to help several people with the same donation. This site also allows people who feel they have little to give to really make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Aquaculture (Fish Farming) as a biologist. I have a small company that offers services to help people improve their production quality.

lender.name: Agnieszka
lender.loan_because: every bit helps.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: Microcredit is the best way to help people. It gives them freedom and independence.
lender.occupational_info: Since I am retired I spent a lot of time on my hobbies: photography and travel.

lender.name: Tone
lender.loan_because: We are all responsible for a better life for people who need it.
lender.occupational_info: I am privileged to have what I need. If I can give a little bit with people who needs a start for a better life, I am grateful to give my share.

lender.name: Kiran, for Nata
lender.loan_because: I have been infinitely fortunate to receive love, encouragement and help from many people during years when I didn't think I could touch the stars. With many shoulders to lean on, I reached, and dreams came true. It is now my privlege to do the same for men and women who dream.
lender.occupational_info: A magical exchange of stories and healing

lender.name: Pixel Light
lender.loan_because: We pride ourselves on being good global citizens and helping other entrepreneurs throughout the developing world.
lender.occupational_info: Pixel Light is a leading Australian digital advertising agency. We provide internet marketing services for businesses in a range of industries throughout Australia.

lender.name: Sage Busch
lender.loan_because: i know what it is like to be poor..and if i can help others to make a better life it will make me happy
lender.occupational_info: im disabled i do not work anymore

lender.name: Jeanette
lender.occupational_info: Not much to me, a difference for them.

lender.name: Gunilla
lender.loan_because: I am so privileged, living in a country that is not in war (for over 100 years ), I can eat plenty of food every day I have 3 healthy kids and 3 healty grandkids so I do want to help others who is not so lucky and have to struggle to survive.
lender.occupational_info: I work 6 days a week in my restaurant making lunch and dinner for hungry people

lender.name: Annika+Robert+Elliott
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone to get a better life

lender.name: Inge Andre
lender.loan_because: I hope it will help some people that needs it.

lender.name: Kathrine
lender.loan_because: When using kiva I know that all the money goes to some who really needs it and because you most likely get the money back you can help more people with the same money , its just great ..
lender.occupational_info: I work in a clothing store

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: "What do we live for if not to make life less difficult for each other?" In developed countries we live in abundance and should remember that others are less fortunate partly because we prevent them from sharing in our abundance.
lender.occupational_info: Power Ergonomics...more power and less pain, improved performance and retained health in work, sports and leisure

lender.name: Sjefsfragle
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people by giving them the opportunity to care for them selves and the comunty around them
lender.occupational_info: I rent out planes in all shapes and sizes

lender.name: Mom-Dad-Killian-Vince
lender.loan_because: We belive that we can help others and that makes us happy! We want to teach our sons how important it is to help others.
lender.occupational_info: At the moment Mirre is a stay-at-home-mom. And Thomas works at Ericsson.

lender.name: sten-åke
lender.loan_because: I what to help people that dont have so mutch and nead so litle to get a better life.I even have a child in india that i help(a little boy) that i send money every month, and before that i had a girl in southern india

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need!

lender.name: Julene
lender.loan_because: What a beautiful opportunity to join with new friends to help out other new friends around the world. "It is good to love as many things as one can, for therein lies true strength; and those who love much, do much and accomplish much; and whatever is done with love is done well." ~ Vincent van Gogh
lender.occupational_info: I work at Save the Chimps in Alamogordo, NM, helping to prepare chimpanzees who were rescued from use in laboratory research, in entertainment, or in the pet trade for transfer to their beautiful permanent retirement home in Florida. www.SaveTheChimps.org (Update: July 2008 "Retired" and moved to Durham, NC) vegan; green; Baha'i

lender.name: Annette
lender.loan_because: Every human is worth a decent life

lender.name: Loom
lender.loan_because: think its great
lender.occupational_info: wine producer

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I believe in peace through prosperity.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good, plus it makes you want to give when you see them really trying hard to better themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I hire stock brokers to come work at my firm to buy and sell stocks for their clients so they become rich.

lender.name: Kolonihagen
lender.loan_because: We believe in the saying «Give a man a fish and he will eat for a day. Teach him how to fish and he will eat for a lifetime». We hope this loan will be the basis of a sustainable grass-root business.

lender.name: Bert-Jan
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship for those who can!
lender.occupational_info: making online banking

lender.name: Rui Gouveia
lender.loan_because: Because I can! Because I believe the world could (should) be a better place if everybody helps...

lender.name: Frederic
lender.loan_because: helping others help themselves is the best way to change the world.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I think micropayments, microlending, and small-scale entrepeneurship are just as cool as any fucking Wal-Mart on the planet.

lender.name: Elisabeth
lender.loan_because: “If anyone has material possessions and sees his brother in need but has no pity on him, how can the love of God be in him? Dear children, let us not love with words or tongue but with actions and in truth.” 1. John 3:17-18 “Give to the one who asks you, and do not turn away from the one who wants to borrow from you.” Matt. 5:42

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: being a business owner is all about hope....and I want to help other hope for a better world.
lender.occupational_info: We develop transport systems for small to midsize companies all over Canada.

lender.name: Veronica
lender.loan_because: I´m fortune that I can, and with love and respect give a helping hand.

lender.name: Janet
lender.occupational_info: nova scotia canada

lender.name: holley
lender.loan_because: I hope to help working mothers support their children.
lender.occupational_info: I write about food and farming for a magazine in the U.S.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I understand the difference between a handout and a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: I live very simply in retirement, i occassionally work as an electrician,or airconditioning repair technician.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference.

lender.name: Justin Milam
lender.loan_because: everyone in this world deserves the opportunity to be successful.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Russ and Carla
lender.loan_because: I am able to....

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I like to contribute to people out to make a real difference in their life.
lender.occupational_info: I fix and maintain desktop computers.

lender.name: Per M
lender.loan_because: It works!

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I hope that someone would do the same for me - if I was the one that needed help.

lender.name: Gross-Lichtenberg Family
lender.loan_because: We want to make the world a better place for our beautiful daughters.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because:
I can.
Those who have should help those who need a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother of two daughters.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to share the blessings I have received with others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I operate a chemical manufacturing plant which makes sulfuric acid.

lender.name: Orlando
lender.loan_because: I believe that capitalism is the best path to prosperity and prosperity is the best path to peace.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy or sell there home.
